data

Class PatientTreatmentDataAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.PatientTreatmentDataAccess

  • public class PatientTreatmentDataAccess
extends java.lang.Object
    This class accesses the database to update and retrieve patient treatment information.

      • addTreatment

        public static boolean addTreatment(int patientId,
                                   java.lang.String rxClass,
                                   java.lang.String[] medications,
                                   java.sql.Date thisDate,
                                   java.lang.String userName,
                                   int clinicId)
        This method connects to the database to record a treatment for a patient.
        Parameters:
        patientId - the patient id
        rxClass - the prescription class
        medications - the medications
        thisDate - the date
        userName - the user name
        clinicId - the clinic id
        Returns:
        the boolean indicating the success or failure of the operation

      • getTreatments

        public static TreatmentHistory getTreatments(java.lang.Integer patientId)
        This method connects to the database to get the treatment history of a patient.
        Parameters:
        patientId - the patient id
        Returns:
        the treatment history of the patient or null if results are missing
